c74object.name: ears.stft~
c74object.description: Computes the spectrogram of an incoming buffer via the Short-Time Fourier Transform

outlet.digest: Buffer containing output magnitudes or real (x) parts, one bin per channel
Buffer containing output phases (in the angleunit coordinate) or imaginary (y) parts, one bin per channel

method.name: list/llll
method.description: A list or llll with buffer names will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).

attribute.name: downmix
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to downmix all the channels into one. If this flag is not set, then one buffer per channel is output. By default downmix is 1.

attribute.name: fullspectrum
attribute.description: Output full spectrum; if not set, it will output the first half of the spectrum only.

attribute.name: polar
attribute.description: Output data in polar coordinates, instead of cartesian ones. Default is 1.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (symbol)
entry.description: Buffer containing audio. Source audio buffer

entry.name: Outlet 1 (symbol)
entry.description: Buffer containing output magnitudes or real (x) parts, one bin per channel.

entry.name: Outlet 2 (symbol)
entry.description: Buffer containing output phases (in the angleunit coordinate) or imaginary (y) parts, one bin per channel.
